alert.note: Alert for Carter; Custer; Fallon; Powder River (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 06 at 2:21AM MDT until April 06 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT TODAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...Carter, Custer, Fallon and Powder River. * WHEN...Until Noon MDT today. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may cause tree and power line damage resulting in power outages. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Accumulating snow is forecast for through the day today. Snow combined with strong winds may produce whiteout conditions at times. Slow down and expect poor visibility and slick roads when snow is encountered.
info.instruction: Watch for falling debris, tree limbs and downed power lines. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution and consider postponing travel until winds subside, or take an alternate route. Ranchers should take precautions to protect young livestock.
